title: First modern Olympic games and national sentiment

content.question:
“When one realizes the influence that the practice of physical exercises may have on the future of a country, and on the force of a whole race, one is tempted to wonder whether Greece is not likely to date a new era from the year 1896.”

Pierre de Coubertin, about the first modern Olympic games in Athens, Greece, 1896

Which of the following offers the best interpretation of the passage above?

choices.label: The development of international organizations to promote world peace
The use of sports to project national and social aspirations
The growth and diffusion of popular culture globally
The influence of Social Darwinism among European elites

content.answer: The use of sports to project national and social aspirations
